name: PT Infonesia Mega Nusantara
description: Developer of a knowledge-sharing platform designed to offer new experiences. The company's platform allows users to become creative question askers, share information and entertainment with a shout-out and get quick responses to their queries, enabling knowledge seekers and sharers to give and receive knowledge and earn income in the process.
one_liner: Developer of a knowledge-sharing platform designed to offer new experiences. The company's platform allows users to become creative question askers, share information and entertainment with a shout-out and get quick responses to their queries, enabling knowledge seekers and sharers to give and receive knowledge and earn income in the process.
